trans-unit.source: Exposes and updates membership user information stored in an Active Directory data store.
trans-unit.target: 公开和更新成员资格用户信息存储在 Active Directory 数据存储。

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is used to represent a single membership user in the Active Directory membership data store.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 对象用于表示 Active Directory 成员资格数据存储区中的单个成员身份用户。

trans-unit.source: It exposes information about the membership user such as the e-mail address, and provides functionality for the membership user such as the ability to change or reset his or her password.
trans-unit.target: 它公开有关的电子邮件地址，例如成员资格用户的信息，并提供成员资格用户，例如可以更改或重置他或她的密码的功能。

trans-unit.source: An ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is returned by the application's membership provider whenever the application is configured to use an Active Directory data store.
trans-unit.target: 每当应用程序配置为使用 Active Directory 数据存储时，将通过应用程序的成员资格提供程序返回 ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 对象。

trans-unit.source: In an application that can be configured to use different data stores, or in an application that uses multiple data stores, you can refer to the base class, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>.
trans-unit.target: 在可以配置的应用程序以使用不同的数据存储，或在的应用程序使用多个数据存储，你可以引用基类<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: Because the ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object does not implement the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> properties, you must be prepared to handle the <xref:System.NotSupportedException> that is thrown when these members are accessed on an ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object.
trans-unit.target: 因为 ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 对象未实现<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>属性，你必须准备好处理<xref:System.NotSupportedException>ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 对象上访问这些成员时引发。</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser class implements internal optimizations used by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> class to minimize the number of attribute updates that occur when calling the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 类实现使用的内部优化<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>类来调用时可能出现的属性更新的数量降至最低<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: It also serializes the <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> representation (available in the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> property) so that an ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object can be serialized and deserialized without throwing exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 它还将序列化<xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>表示形式 (位于<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>属性) 以便 ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 对象可以序列化和反序列化而不引发异常。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> </xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>

trans-unit.source: A ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is returned by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> methods or as part of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 会返回 ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 对象<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>方法或作为的一部分<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection>返回<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: An ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is required by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method when you want to update the information for an existing membership user.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 对象所需的<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>方法如果你想要更新现有的成员资格用户的信息。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser properties are mapped to Active Directory attributes.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 属性映射到 Active Directory 属性。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser properties and their default attribute mappings.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出 ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 属性和其默认属性映射。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Default directory attribute|Can be mapped?| |--------------|---------------------------------|--------------------| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>|`securityIdentifier`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A>|`userPrincipalName`|Yes, but must be either userPrincipalName or sAMAccountName| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A>|`comment`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A>|`whenCreated`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A>|`mail`|Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>|n/a|Not supported by <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>|n/a|Not supported by <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A>|`pwdLastSet`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A>|none, but must be mapped to an attribute if using question-and-answer security for password reset or retrieval.|Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A>|`User-Account-Control` (AD)
trans-unit.target: |属性 |默认目录属性 |可以映射？ | |--------------|---------------------------------|--------------------| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>|`securityIdentifier`|否 | |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A>|`userPrincipalName`|是，但必须 userPrincipalName 或 sAMAccountName | |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A>|`comment`|否 | |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A>|`whenCreated`|否 | |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A>|`mail`|是，但必须是单值属性的类型的 Unicode 字符串。 | |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>|n/a|不受<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>。 | |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>|n/a|不受<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>。 | |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A>|`pwdLastSet`|否 | |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A>| none，但必须映射到属性中，如果使用密码重置或检索的问题答案安全机制。 |是，但必须是单值属性的类型的 Unicode 字符串。 | |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A>|`User-Account-Control` (AD)</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: `mDS-UserAccountDisabled` (ADAM)|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>|computed from `lockoutTime` and the AD lockout duration (AD on Windows 2000)
trans-unit.target: `mDS-UserAccountDisabled`(ADAM) |否 | |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>| 从计算`lockoutTime`和 AD 锁定持续时间 (在 Windows 2000 上的 AD)</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (AD on Windows Server 2003)
trans-unit.target: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed`(在 Windows Server 2003 上的 AD)

trans-unit.source: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (ADAM)|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>|If locked out due to too many bad password attempts, the lockout time attribute is returned.
trans-unit.target: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed`(ADAM) |否 | |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>|如果由于错误密码尝试次数过多而被锁定，则返回锁定时间属性。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If locked out due to too many bad password answer attempts, the value stored in the attribute defined by `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果锁定由于过多错误密码答案尝试，通过定义的特性中存储的值`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime`返回。

trans-unit.source: If locked out due to both a bad password and too many bad password attempts, the most recent date/time value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果尝试锁定由于密码错误和太多错误密码，则返回的最新的日期/时间值。

trans-unit.source: If the account is not locked out, return 1/1/1753 for SQL compatibility.|No|
trans-unit.target: 如果帐户未锁定，则返回 1/1/1753，以便与 SQL 兼容性。 |否 |

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> object for a class that inherits the <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref>继承的类的对象<xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser constructor is not intended to be used from your code.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 构造函数不应在代码中使用。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> class with the specified property values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref>带有指定的属性值的类。

trans-unit.source: Creating a new <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object does not add a new membership user object to the membership data store.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>对象不会向成员资格数据存储区中添加新的成员资格用户对象。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: To add a new membership user to the membership data store, use the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将新的成员资格用户添加到成员资格数据存储区中，使用<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method returns an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object for the membership user added to the data store.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>成员资格用户添加到数据存储的对象。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objects are commonly constructed in application code for use with the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method, although you can also pass an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object returned from the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> method to the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method as well.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>通常用于应用程序代码中构造的对象<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>方法，虽然你还可以传递<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>从返回的对象<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>方法也。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objects are also commonly constructed by membership provider implementations for the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>对象通常也通过成员资格提供程序实现构造<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*>成员资格用户。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*>成员资格用户。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*>成员资格用户。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*> address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*>的成员资格用户的地址。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*>成员资格用户。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*>成员资格用户。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*> value for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*>成员资格用户的值。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*> value for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*>成员资格用户的值。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*>成员资格用户。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*>成员资格用户。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*>成员资格用户。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*>成员资格用户。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*>成员资格用户。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets application-specific information for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置成员资格用户的应用程序特定信息。

trans-unit.source: The Comment property can be used to store custom information for a membership user that is specific to an application.
trans-unit.target: 注释属性可以用于存储特定于应用程序的成员资格用户的自定义信息。

trans-unit.source: The amount of information that can be stored in the `Comment` property for an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> is defined by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 可以存储在的信息的量`Comment` <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>由定义</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>的属性

trans-unit.source: The Comment property is mapped to the `Comment` default Active Directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: 注释属性映射到`Comment`默认 Active Directory 属性。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能被重新映射到另一个属性。

trans-unit.source: Application-specific information for the Active Directory member stored in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Comment" name="Comment" href=""></xref> directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序特定信息存储在 Active Directory 成员<xref uid="langword_csharp_Comment" name="Comment" href=""> </xref> directory 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the e-mail address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置成员资格用户的电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: The Email property is mapped to the `Mail` directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: 电子邮件属性映射到`Mail`directory 属性。

trans-unit.source: This property can be remapped in the Web.config file by setting the `attributeMapUserName` attribute in the [providers Element for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) element for profiles.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可被重新映射在 Web.config 文件中通过设置`attributeMapUserName`属性中[元素的提供程序配置文件 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f)配置文件的元素。

trans-unit.source: The e-mail address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: 成员资格用户的电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the membership user can be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以验证成员资格用户。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> value for a membership user is checked during the call to <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>在<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>受支持<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>调用的过程中检查成员资格用户的值</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: If the IsApproved property returns `false`, the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method returns `false` even if the supplied user name and password are correct.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IsApproved 属性返回`false`、<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>方法返回`false`即使提供的用户名和密码正确无误。</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: The IsApproved property is mapped to one of the following Active Directory attributes.
trans-unit.target: IsApproved 属性映射到以下的 Active Directory 属性之一。

trans-unit.source: ||| |-|-| |Active Directory|`User-Account-Control`| |Active Directory Application Mode|`msDS-UserAccountDisabled`| This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.
trans-unit.target: ||| |-|-| |Active Directory |`User-Account-Control`| |Active Directory 应用程序模式 |`msDS-UserAccountDisabled`| 此属性不能被重新映射到另一个属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can be authenticated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以对用户进行身份验证;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: 获取成员资格用户的用户标识符从 Active Directory 数据存储区。

trans-unit.source: The ProviderUserKey property exposes the identifier from the membership data source generically typed as an `object`.
trans-unit.target: 查找文本属性公开的数据源以泛型类型的成员身份中的标识符`object`。

trans-unit.source: The ProviderUserKey class can be cast as a <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> object.
trans-unit.target: 查找类可以强制转换为<xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>对象。</xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>

trans-unit.source: The user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: 成员资格用户存储中的 Active Directory 数据的用户标识符。
